titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1,3-Benzenedicarboxylic acid, 5-sulfo-1,3-dimethyl ester sodium salt.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/12/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2004, the duty on a specified chemical.
